column4: On my system, randomly all 4 cores spike to about 70/80% usage on conky, top shows nothing is taking anywhere close to that amount of cpu, yet my computer is sluggish...anyone know whats going on?
It happens about once every 1-2 days, and lasts for about a minute, and then everything is back to normal.
ah...not monitoring that...how can I check that at a command line next time this happens?
